TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpContextBase extends System.Object implements class System.IServiceProvider
Public MustInherit Class HttpContextBase Implements IServiceProvider
public ref class HttpContextBase abstract : IServiceProvider

summary.span: 为包含有关单个 HTTP 请求的 HTTP 特定信息的类充当基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that contain HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个抽象类，包含相同的成员类。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 类使你能够创建类似的派生的类类，但你可以自定义并使用 ASP.NET 管道外部。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 当执行单元测试时，通常使用派生的类以实现具有满足你测试的方案的自定义行为的成员。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 类是从 类派生的。The class derives from the class. 类用作包装器类。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在运行时，你通常使用的实例要对其调用成员的类对象。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members on the object.

Protected Sub New ()
protected: HttpContextBase();

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你设置`handler`到`null`，默认处理程序用于处理该请求。If you set `handler` to `null`, the default handler is used to process the request. 你可以设置`handler`到异步处理程序或同步的处理程序。You can set `handler` to either an asynchronous handler or to an synchronous handler. 处理程序必须实现接口。The handler must implement the interface.
